title: Scope Your AI Product MVP
description: Define your AI product's core value proposition and MVP scope
instructions:
Create a comprehensive product scope for your AI application:

1. Define the problem you're solving (specific, measurable pain)
2. Describe your solution (how AI solves it uniquely)
3. Identify target users (be specific: 'software engineers' not 'everyone')
4. List 5-8 potential features, categorize each:
   - userValue: critical/important/nice-to-have
   - complexity: simple/medium/complex
   - mvpDecision: must-have/v2/skip
5. Define 3-5 SMART success metrics
6. Choose 3-5 must-have features for 2-week MVP

Follow the 80/20 rule: Focus on 20% of features that deliver 80% of value.

testCases.description: MVP has 5 or fewer must-have features

hints: Start with a specific problem you've experienced personally
Target users should be narrow (e.g., 'junior developers learning React' not 'developers')
Most features should be 'v2' or 'skip' - be ruthless with scope
Success metrics should be measurable (time saved, adoption rate, quality score)
2-week MVP should be the absolute minimum to validate value
